titlestmt.titleproper: Descriptive catalogue of pictures painted by Robert Edge Pine

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2023-04-06 17:51:42 -0400.

did.unittitle: Descriptive catalogue of pictures painted by Robert Edge Pine

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: The Archives of American art does not own the original papers. Use is limited to the microfilm copy.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Catalog listing 27 paintings in a six page catalog. Some listings have dates, descriptions, and excerpts from plays on which images are based; some have title only.

altformavail.head: Existence and Location of Copies
altformavail.p: 35mm microfilm reel 4560 available for use at Archives of American Art offices and through interlibrary loan.

originalsloc.head: Existence and Location of Originals
originalsloc.p: Original in: The Historical Society of Pennsylvania, Etting Collection.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Authorization to publish, quote or reproduce requires written permission from the Historical Society of Pennsylvania. Contact Reference Services for more information.

userestrict.head: Terms of Use
userestrict.p: The Archives of American Art makes its archival collections available for non-commercial, educational and personal use unless restricted by copyright and/or donor restrictions, including but not limited to access and publication restrictions. AAA makes no representations concerning such rights and restrictions and it is the user's responsibility to determine whether rights or restrictions exist and to obtain any necessary permission to access, use, reproduce and publish the collections. Please refer to the Smithsonian's Terms of Use for additional information.

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: Robert Edge Pine (1730?-1788) was a portait and historical painter from Philadelphia, Penn. Pine was born in London and emigrated to U.S. in 1784.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: Lent for microfilming by the Historical Society of Pennsylvania, 1991, as part of AAA's Philadelphia Arts Documentation Project.
